name: PC Repair Simulator 2020
description:
Global Game Jam 2020 VR PC Repair Game

Made By:

Evan Kessman

Benjamin Wilcox

Abu Bangurah

Take apart a PC and try to repair it, but watch out, the computer may shock you if you put it back together wrong. Made in Unity using SteamVR.

Assets Used:

  • Snaps Buried Memories Vol. 2 - Unity Asset Store Originals
  • Ultra Emissive Particles Shader - Galactic Studios
  • SteamVR Plugin - Valve Corporation
  • Screwdriver - kropaman
  • Blade Runner Type Ambient (Background Music) - onderwish
  • CPU Fan/Cooler - Mark Hedron
  • Random Access Memory - SampleDotTxt
  • Open PC Computer Case 3D Model - https://bit.ly/2Ukx7lS (No Artist Shown)
  • Nvidia 2080 Ti Graphic Card - paxillop
